entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT Testing Strategies for .NET 7 #64832
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: LinkedDictionary #64829
  • JIT: Forward sub exposing missing containment safety checks in lower #64828
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Compiler produce warnings #64824
  • JIT: Fold constant access to [ReadOnly]Span<T> especially for char and byte #64823
    Future
  • NativeAOT publish warning messages #64822
  • Improving ARM64 Performance in .NET 7.0 #64820
  • Arm64: Better addressing mode for float/double array access #64819
  • [release/6.0] ILVerify does not build in source-build #64817
  • Some Cryptography tests fail on RHEL 9 arm64. #64816
  • Arm64: Evaluate if it is possible to combine subsequent field loads in a single load #64815
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not support ReferenceHandler.Preserve option #64813
  • Introduce DbDataSource abstraction to System.Data #64812
    7.0.0
  • [DllImportGenerator] ignore DLLIMPORTGEN003 #64811
  • Assertion failed 'compiler->opts.IsOSR() || ((genInitStkLclCnt > 0) == hasUntrLcl)' #64808
    7.0.0
  • REQUEST: Customize ComHost server registry name #64803
  • [UWP] ILC.exe fails with "MSBUILD : error : Internal compiler error: Sequence contains no elements" #64801
  • [android][arm64] System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingWithIPAddressAndBigSize throws PNSE #64798
  • Arm64: In mod operation happening inside the loop, if divisor is an invariant, hoist the divisor checks #64795
  • JIT: checked/release asm diff in GitHub_17777 #64793
    7.0.0
  • Weird FindFirstFileExW behavior on FAT32 #64789
  • Assertion failed '!compDonotInline()' during 'Morph - Inlining' #64787
    7.0.0
  • SetCookieHeaderValue - System.TypeLoadException: Could not load type Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.InplaceStringBuilder' #64786
  • [JIT] ARM64 instructions `cmle` `cmlt` `fcmle` `fcmlt` are not emitted anywhere #64785
  • Vector128/256.Create(const ulong) uses slow software fallback on x86 #64784
    7.0.0
  • Windows Time Zone Identifiers not supported in .NET 6 Blazor WASM #64778

Closed

  • system.globalization.tests.icutests.icushouldbeloaded #64763
  • Assertion failed: OpenSsl error queue is not empty #57722
    7.0.0
  • Closing the AsyncWaitHandle from the result of socket.BeginConnect crashes the application in .NET 6.0 #64400
    7.0.0
  • Connecting a Blazor Client app to an Azure Service Bus? #64620
  • Arm64: Readjust the heuristics to materialize double constants using fmov #64794
  • Assertion failed '!nodeInfo.IsLclVarWrite() || !unusedLclVarReads.Contains(nodeInfo.LclNum())' #57919
    7.0.0
  • Linq count is slower than linq where count #64728
  • [wasm] NodeJS samples failing at exit with emsdk `2.0.34` #64727
  • macOS dotnet 3.1/5 debug alternatively working, run without debug works always #56850
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'fldSeqForStaticVar->GetTail() == zeroOffsetFldSeq' during 'Do value numbering' #64773
    7.0.0
  • WinformsControlsTest cannot be run under debugger in Visual Studio #64568
    7.0.0
  • [WASM] main.js missing in wasm-aot performance runs #64553
    7.0.0
  • net5.0 app crash on Apple M1 under Rosetta 2 emulation #48877
    5.0.x
  • Wrong code generation for Unsafe.AsRef<T>, Read<T> when T is a structure #64802
  • [System.Reflection.Emit] Can't implement a method with a ReadOnlySpan<> argument #64799
  • Build failure: "...nativeaot\Runtime\Full\AsmOffsets.cs' could not be found" #64557
  • Arm64: Readjust the heuristics to materialize double constants using fmov #64791
  • Arm64: Readjust the heuristics to materialize double constants using fmov #64792
  • Arm64: Readjust the heuristics to materialize double constants using fmov #64790
  • normal-system.text.json.sourcegeneration.roslyn3.11.unit.tests work item #64762
  • GC suspension & UNIX signals corrupt each other's memory on the stack on macOS #44498
    5.0.x
  • Support .NET on Apple Silicon with Rosetta 2 emulation #44897
    5.0.x
  • Add the ArchiveComment property for ZipArchive class #1547
    7.0.0
  • wasmtestonbrowser-system.text.regularexpressions.tests work item #64781
  • R2RDump crashes when disassembling composite framework due to duplicate key in PGO method map #64291
    7.0.0
  • Unsafe.SizeOf<T>() causes an additional mov over sizeof(T) #55472
    Future
  • JIT doesn't always fold 'add' instructions into 'lea' which immediately follows it #51599
    Future
  • typeof(T).IsValueType not completely unimpactful in some cases #48605
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Set up an analyzer exception filter to make intermittent failures more actionable. #64836
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Enable merging of platform-variant tests #64835
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Disable ILVerify for source build #64833
    area-ILVerification
  • Add `runtime-wasm` pipeline #64830
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Another size estimate fix for `mov`s #64826
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update RateLimiter queues on cancellation #64825
    area-System.Threading
  • Unroll String.StartsWith for constant input and ordinal #64821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mobile] Add extra HttpClientHandler linker substitution #64818
    area-System.Net.Http, linkable-framework, size-reduction
  • Fix operator precedence consistency in ASCIIUtility.GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #64814
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Clean-up DllImportGenerator packaging infra #64810
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Move IsKnownConstant handling to ExtendedDefaultPolicy #64809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add exports to workaround emscripten bug #64807
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix missing zero-offset sequences and add checking #64805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix scenario specific tests #64800
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [JIT] More ARM64 comparison instruction optimizations with Vector.Zero #64783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Streamline bool.TryParse/Format #64782
    area-System.Runtime
  • Disable failing EventLogSession.GetProviderNames test #64780
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • [release/6.0] Fix Logging source generator failures with various syntax #64779
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Logging

Merged

  • Move 20H2 queues to server 2022 #64827
    area-Infrastructure
  • Improve perf of Enumerable.Sum/Average/Max/Min for arrays and lists #64624
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • [Jit] Delete Statement::m_compilerAdded . #64506
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Track local var ranges for "interfering writes" LIR check #64804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Some cleanup of wasm jobs in runtime-extra-platforms #64766
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • make sure failed SSL does not impact other sessions #64256
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Handle ((IAsyncResult)task).AsyncWaitHandle.Dispose better in task completion #64627
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] pass ExitStatus when calling quit_ #64734
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix outerloop AcceptAsync_WithTooSmallReceiveBuffer_Failure test #64758
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • mono_get_generic_info_from_stack_frame fix for default interface methods #64566
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Split out clr.tools unit tests #64788
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable failing tests #64759
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • fix some test for FreeBSD #64426
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Fix issue in r2rdump where conflicting generic instantiations can cause the r2rdump process to fail #64772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Add S.S.C.Cose with COSE Sign1 support #64461
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Run debugger test in codespace #64746
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName alternate design #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use global caching in JsonSerializerOptions #64646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Local heap optimizations on Arm64 #64481
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Increase default HostOptions.ShutdownTimeout value to 30 seconds #63712
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove spin lock from SocketAsyncEventArgs on Windows #64770
    area-System.Net.Sockets, tenet-performance
  • Initial roll out of !! #64720
    area-Meta
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Consolidate _handshakeBuffer and _internalBuffer in SslStream #64747
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/6.0] Update helix queues #64721
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix Issue 62756 Some outer loop tests on Linux fail unless run as root #64619
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-linux, community-contribution
  • #51017 enable tests for android #64743
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-android
  • [mono] Remove OP_FCONV_TO_U opcode #64618
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Optimize the remaining awaitable types in S.P.C. #64564
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Delete custom cmake config cache mechanism on Unix #64370
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Allow symbols 3 external symbols into the gcc/gcov library. #64236
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] new wasm invoke icall with necessary changes from custom marshalers, but no marshalers #63998
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [Mono] Add linux-x64 coop gc test run to runtime-staging #64468
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Skip AOT of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll for WASM, due to out-of-memory issues in CI #63958
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Update Android to r23b image #64567
    os-android, area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
    area-System.Diagnostics, os-android
  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #64642
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64556
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NO MERGE] SHM_NAME_MAX #64752
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • add code to read active listeners on FreeBSD #64433
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Take into account zero-offset field sequences when propagating locals #64701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [build] Move Mono API headers to src/native/include/mono-2.0 #64569
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixed debugger attachment to a project with special characters in the path. #64527
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64102
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add ActivitySource support to DiagnosticsHandler #64753
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Move MacCatalyst to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #64452
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change the way we build CoreCLR tests for NativeAOT #64738
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket tests on NodeJS #64330
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT ARM64 libraries testing #64373
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Enable set of nullability checks in NativeAOT CoreLib #64730
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add default method support to virtual statics #64717
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Fix too wide memory accesses for nullchecks #64683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Better default for L3 cache size on win-arm64 and lin-arm64 #64645
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Question fcntl F_DUPFD_CLOEXEC and WASI #1847

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Change importance of missing EMSDK Message task to High so it appears on the console #1846

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1032 errors have no valid help link in VS #23769
  • dotnet nuget outdated #23762
  • Workload advertising update timer should be separate for each feature band #23760
    6.0.3xx
  • Rename "NetSdkManaged" types to "FileBased" #23758

Closed

  • `dotnet workload update --print-rollback` should not require elevated privileges #22886
    6.0.3xx

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump System.Net.Http from 4.3.2 to 4.3.4 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/11TestAppWith10CLIToolReferences #23726
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1592375 #23759
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure properties are escaped with double quotes #23720
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Reverse versions in error message #23748
    Area-Workloads
  • Add property builder helper #23730
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quick Actions and Refactorings: "Add parameter to constructor" in partial class replaces current file content with the file containing the constructor #59292
  • False code suggestion for a not existing Problem #59291
  • C# interactive has problems with `switch` expression with `var` #59290
  • Quick Actions "Use pattern matching" after #endif directive adds extra #endif #59289
  • IDE0062 code fix (local function can be static) removes "unsafe" keyword #59286
  • DebugRoslynComponent cannot read config from csproj #59272
  • Make OptionKey serializable so that integration tests can pass it between processes #59267
  • [LSP] Experiment with LSP client on VSMac #59265
  • EnC: Allow signature changes and method/field/etc renames #59264
  • Consolidate data tracked over an async completion session #59262

Closed

  • Invalid "Add parameter" suggestion #35342
    Backlog
  • VisualBasicUseConditionalExpressionForAssignmentCodeRefactoringProvider STILL on Error #32087
    Backlog
  • Add `IOperation CreateLazyOperation(BoundExpression exprOpt)` helper method #26435
    Backlog
  • Implicit conversion from type annotated with InterpolatedStringHandler crashes compiler #58346
    17.1
  • Crash when casting to function pointer under specific circumstances #57994
    17.2
  • Control+, Go To Type show same info for partial class with certain filename. #31563
    Backlog
  • "Use pattern matching" isn't available in some trivial cases #31835
    Backlog
  • Double-clicking item in "Find all References" does not work if line is in a collapsed regaion #31856
    Backlog
  • CSharpMoveDeclarationNearReferenceCodeRefactoringProvider throw exceptions #30977
    Backlog
  • interface generation double bug #31112
    Backlog
  • Unable to decompile MemoryStream #31122
    Backlog
  • OverrideCompletion crashes IDE on property without accessors #30385
    Backlog
  • NavTo display string is wrong for VB generic methods #30457
    Backlog
  • VirtualChar system cannot handle 32bit wide characters #29174
    Backlog
  • C# Quick Actions doesn't work with Extension Methods with out parameters #28552
    Backlog
  • Incorrectly inserting using statements #25980
    Backlog
  • "Make field readonly" should be offered when taking readonly ref #26263
    Backlog
  • ReplacePropertyWithMethodsCodeRefactoringProvider encounted an error and has been disabled #24631
    Backlog
  • Incorrect behavior around directives for unused usings code fix when file only contains usings #1323
    Backlog
  • Intellisense suggests full type name when it is not necessary #17729
    Backlog
  • Block comment breaks when caret in /**/ and between */ and hit Enter #16417
    Backlog
  • Target typing for return #16952
    Backlog
  • SyntaxGenerator can't generate expression-bodied members #16953
    Backlog
  • Contextual keywords aren't escaped in symbol display strings. #13610
    Backlog
  • Using elivs operator lowers code coverage #14114
    Backlog
  • Offer to convert method calls with string and objects to interpolated strings #11759
    Backlog
  • #pragma warning disable IDE0002 does not disable graying out #12213
    Backlog
  • Syntax normalizer uses CRLF for EOL character by default #8537
    Backlog
  • Suspicious `string.Format` invocation in `IntHashTable` constructor #9171
    Backlog
  • Unable to remove trailing trivia on code blocks #7760
    Backlog
  • We don't handle a C# file in a VB project correctly #8048
    Backlog
  • Type Inferrer should use argument count and out/ref status to pick overload #5791
    Backlog
  • Comment selection on a line with a collapsed region should comment the whole region #5587
    Backlog
  • "Go To Definition" command places cursor at end of method name. #2021
    Backlog
  • Deprecate GetSymbolInfo and add identical but renamed GetReferencedSymbolInfo #3322
    Backlog
  • Avoid passing titles to INotificationService when redundant #3363
    Backlog
  • The name does not exist in the current context #59275
  • Suboptimal code is generated for evaluation of list patterns, could be an artifact of used subsumption checking strategy #57731
    C# 11.0
  • No Quick Info when hovering over methods or property during debugging #1446
    Backlog
  • Introduce constant copies trivia twice #1016
    Backlog
  • VB NavBar doesn't always navigate to first member in (especially in Metadata as source) #558
    Backlog
  • Incorrect diff when fix causes conflicts / warning annotations #475
    Backlog
  • IDE0072: False positive when using switch expression and pattern matching with "or" to default case #58468
    17.2
  • Conditional Return Expression #59268
  • Missing quick refactor action to convert event add/remove into expression body #59255

PullRequests

Created

  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure command handler doesn't index out of bounds when at end of file #59302
    Area-IDE
  • Cache the unescaped form of globalconfig section names #59301
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure we emit a reference-equality check against null when generating .Equals #59300
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid 0-length spans #59299
    Area-IDE
  • Prevent certain keywords from appearing in case clause #59298
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for unsafe local functions in IDE0062 code fix #59297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Improve loc string. #59296
    Area-IDE
  • Add test showing issue doesn't repro #59295
    Area-IDE
  • Cascade between position record parameters and properties. #59293
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for decoding required members in metadata #59288
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Insert release/dev17.2 branch to VS rel branch #59287
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix definite assignment crash with list-patterns #59285
    New Feature - List Patterns
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • Fix DeclaringCompilation for source methods #59278
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix parameter completion for partially written lambdas #59277
    Area-IDE
  • Fix fading span for unnecessary using #59276
    Area-IDE
  • Associate module EnC diagnostics with changed documents #59273
    Area-Interactive, Approved to merge, 17.1
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [LSP] respect formatting options in snippets #59266
    Area-IDE, LSP

Merged

  • Don't show colon suffix in property pattern completion #59031
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59294
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Unskip TestSupportedDiagnosticsMessageHelpLinkUri #51882
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Bump MS.VS.RpcContract version #59284
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix remove-using when surrounded by pp directives in empty files #59282
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update integration test harness for 17.2 Preview 1 #59281
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59279
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Avoid eagerly calling SyntaxTreeOptionsProvider.IsGenerated #59244
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Support declaration and emit of `required` members in source #58507
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • List patterns: Recreate the decision dag for lowering #59019
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59280
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove a first chance exception for normal cancellation #58646
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix issue link #59158
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Snap config changes #59269
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert "Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project - take 2" #59242
    Area-IDE
  • Make CompletionOptions global #59117
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P1
  • Fix generate method in switch arms. #59261
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P1
  • Fix 'populate switch' to understand more possible user cases #59259
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P1
  • Support block/expression body preferences for event accessors #59256
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P1
  • Don't offer 'use not null' when inside an expression tree #59254
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P1

Updated

  • Fixed IDE0044 (Make Field Readonly) for DataMember fields in DataContract classes #43489
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Follow up on LDM decisions made 2022-01-26 #59229
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • Function pointer calling convention IDE support #59062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support multi-caret when inserting doc comments #54741
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Cover additional cases in implicit object creation analyzer #57679
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Handle more cases in both new line formatting and curly brace completion #53222
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Use constant interpolated string analyzer #51705
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • fix restore on nuget 6.2.0.33 #59230
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Go To Implementation show metadata results #59100
    Area-IDE
  • More fault handling cleanup #59097
    Area-IDE
  • Remove netstandard1.3 from code base #59177
    Area-Infrastructure
  • draft #58910
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Update breaking changes document for 17.0 struct initializer fixes #59245
    Area-Compilers
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records
  • Update incremental generator docs #58344
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators
  • [semi-auto-props]: Avoid using `IsAutoProperty` when possible #59109
    Area-Compilers
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Produce a System.Web.HttpContext shim based on ASP.NET Core HTTP types #40001
  • Blazor CascadingTypeParameter does not pass type parameter to children that have multiple type parameters #39994
  • .Net core 6 app errors using Microsoft Identity Platfrom after log on #39993
  • ASP.NET Core Web App (MVC) generates controller with blocked namespace #39992
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Inconsistent Claim types between Token, Blazor and aspnet dotnet 6 #39991
  • Installing aspnetcore-runtime-6.0.1-win-x64.exe fails to detect IIS on Windows Server 2019 and does not install ASPNetCoreModule. #39988
  • Quarantine GracefulTurnsAbortiveIfRequestsDoNotFinish #39986
    Test failures
  • Quarantine GET_GracefulServerShutdown_AbortRequestsAfterHostTimeout #39985
    Test failures
  • Add avif images to default known static file MIME types #39984
  • More stable response time on .NET 3.1 then .NET 6 #39981
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #39980
  • Weird mix of Turkish and English when restoring #39978

Closed

  • IIS: Using Windows Authentication assigns ClaimsPrincipal to User if AuthenticationSchemes are defined in an AuthorizationPolicy #39901
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Debugging with VSCode on Linux: Cannot launch browser, debugging not possible #39976
    7.0-preview2
  • Ability to use DiagnosticSource in Kestrel without the rest of ASP.NET Core #39744
  • Upgrading Authentication.JwtBearer 6.0.1 throws null exception at runtime #39787
  • Blazor server side, NavigationManager.NavigateTo not checking AuthenticationState #39929
  • Remove obsolete member in src/Middleware/StaticFiles/src/StaticFileResponseContext.cs #7149
    6.0-preview1
  • Incorrect global:: for generic types #39950
    7.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • Change LogLevel Warning to Debug for LoggerEventIds.VerifyUserTokenFailed in UserManager #40000
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Avoid request body rate timeout in flaky test #39999
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Do not build when publishing in Helix CI jobs #39998
    area-infrastructure
  • Activate components by default #39997
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] [blazor][debugger] Fixing vs-js-debugger: redirect ws to http is not supported anymore #39996
    area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [blazor][debugger] Fixing vs-js-debugger: redirect ws to http is not supported anymore #39995
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview2
  • Support Custom Classes for ValidationMessage (with E2E) #39990
    area-blazor, auto-merge
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6b74da4` to `4517697` #39905
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Refactor : Enable CA1847 #39983
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Quarantine flaky tests #39987
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview2
  • SimpleTypeModelBinder.CheckModel: add API doc #39982
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6b74da4` to `4517697` #39904
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Enable CA2007 for all ns2.0 projects #39946
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • Allow pdb delta to be optionally included in a hot reload payload #39742
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.3
  • Don't compare SequencePosition instances #39975
    area-runtime
  • Write fields directive to streamwriter #39900

  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216

  • Add format analyzer for `BindAsync` and `TryParse` custom bindings #37002

  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • Respect -noBuildNative for Kestrel #39619

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BasicBlazorComponentClick test is flaky #4517

Closed

  • Label control's text attribute does not handle non-english alphabet characters, and it throws XamlCTask error #4412
  • [WinUI, Shell] Convert bottom tabs on WinUI Shell to using HierarchicalNavigationItems #4448
  • Shell FlyoutWidth wrong first load on Windows #4144
  • [WinUI] Fix Shell to work with ExtendsContentIntoTitleBar #3864

PullRequests

Created

    platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, 6.0.300-preview.14

Merged

    area/templates 📄
  • EvaluateJavaScriptAsync with CommandMapper (Version 2) #4507

  • Shell WinUI Handler #4501
    area/shell 🐢
  • Don't force a min size of zero for controls #4422
  • Remove `IPlatformInvalidate` and `Device.Invalidate()` #4479
    area/migration 🚚
  • [build] don't edit global.json during the build #4512
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4504
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Refactor DeviceInfo to use an interface #4465
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Blazor] Add missing RootComponentCollectionExtensions to Wpf and Maui #4384
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • iOS NavigationRend-andler #3969

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ToLower not working with AsQueryable on sqlite #27378
  • Support numbered positional parameter placeholders #27377
  • Split queries when use Join with AsSplitQuery (EfCore 6.0) #27376
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - migration rollback doesn't work #27375
    6.0.x
  • Seeded geometry is re-updated when scaffolding new migration [NetTopologySuite] #27374
  • Optimize SQL Server OUTPUT clause usage when retrieving database-generated values #27372
  • Query causes InvalidOperationException when creating an anonymous type #27371
  • IQueryable.Count() throws InvalidOperationException #27370

Closed

  • `Include()` in EF Core adds more items to list than are in database #27327
  • `The 'bool' property 'X' on entity type 'Y' is configured with a database-generated default` for type: `bit` #27332
  • [Question] Redeclare `IdentityUser.Id` #27373
  • EF bundle seems to not be properly passing --connection parameter #27325
  • Invalid translation of a Query with GroupBy #27364
  • Add-Migration ignores IDesignTimeDbContextFactory implementation and starts project instead after upgrading to EFCore 6 #27358
  • Better handling of default value in inherited Base entity in DbContext #27341
  • Is there a way to create a migration by comparing the current ContextModelSnapshot to a live DB? #27275
  • [Question] SQL server query with update operation in EF core #27353
  • Optimize hangs and stops responding. #27301
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27375 - EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - migration rollback doesn't work #27379
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/6.0] Temporal table support for owned and table splitting scenarios #27369

Merged

  • Remove quirks #27357
  • Fix for the optimizer when an entity has a collection property that references itself. #27350
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix parameter type mapping for Sqlite #27291
